caption.p: Empirical distribution of the amount of biodegraded oil, amount of oil on the surface and amount of stranded oil, 15 days after the start of the release, for all scenarios. Simulations are classified as Winter (70% ice cover or higher) or Summer (30% ice cover or less). The number of simulations in each category is given in the legends. Note that in some scenarios the ice cover never exceeds 70%
